main event: A round white object, the size of a basketball, was observed moving erratically and then fading to darkness in San Antonio, Texas, on 22 September 1955.
interesting points: The object was first seen at a 3406-degree azimuth with a 75-degree elevation., The sighting lasted for about ten minutes., The object made several erratic movements before disappearing., Other witnesses included military personnel at Kelly Air Force Base., It was initially described as resembling a falling star before it faded.
witness description: Senior aircraft mechanic and a shipping clerk supervisor from Kelly AFB, Texas.
